about_the_game:
In the wake of a horrific military raid on your woodland camp, the werewolf pack has become fractured and divided. When fate brings these disparate parties into contact once again, will your allies be able to put aside their differences long enough to survive the myriad dangers lying in wait?

Werewolves 3: Evolution's End is a 680,000 word interactive novel in Jeffrey Dean's acclaimed "Claw, Shadow, and Sage" series, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

This thrilling follow-up to Werewolves 2: Pack Mentality seamlessly integrates your choices and experiences from the previous two volumes into a new tale of survival and loyalty, desperation and betrayal.

Threats from the outside world are preparing to strike at any moment, but your species also fights an internal war against the malevolent forces of their inner beasts. A feral plague is running rampant, provoking rage and madness in those wolves it infects. Forces under the government's control are seeking you out, but surviving the coming battle will be impossible without first conquering the enemy within.

All hopes are bound to a single, unlikely ally—the mysterious scientist known only as Maker. She alone holds the key to understanding this plague, and despite her cruel and unforgivable experiments on werewolf-kind, the pack must keep her alive and well until she can discover a permanent cure for the disease. But what are Maker's true motivations? Is she your pack's last hope or its greatest threat?

  • Choose your friends and enemies carefully—the final battle is coming fast and your alliances are the key to victory!

  • Discover the truth behind a scientist's obsession with accelerated evolution.

  • Survive and overcome a mysterious plague that threatens to turn your pack members against each other.

  • Return to a perilous military facility and fight your fears as you search for answers.

  • All of your favorite characters return, including extensive continuations of all five romances from the previous volumes.

  • Determine your true alliances once and for all: Will you work toward peace between humans and werewolves? Seek to cure your own kind of their feral nature? Join a crusade to destroy humanity so the wolves can rise from their ashes? Or perhaps a far darker fate awaits as you race toward evolution's end?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is about werewolves fighting for their survival. Werewolves are tropes that explore the extremes of human emotion, particularly violence, rage, and passion. Some of the descriptions of sexual contact are explicit without being graphically described.

Reader discretion is advised.
